articles.author: Kingshuk Kusari
articles.title: AB de Villiers issues apology to Virat Kohli and Anushka Sharma, urges fans to give them privacy - India Today
articles.description: Former South Africa cricketer AB de Villiers has issued an apology to Virat Kohli and his family de Villiers had said on his YouTube channel that Kohli and Anushka were going to have a second child a statement that he retracted later ABD has urged fans to giv…
articles.content: Former South Africa cricketer AB de Villiers has issued an apology to Virat Kohli and his family. De Villiers' apology comes after he claimed that Kohli and Anushka Sharma were going to have a child,… [+2821 chars]
